name: Adrenaline Surge
description: +1 action during this activation, and +1 action during next activation.

name: Antigravity Projection
description: The target figure gains the Levitate attribute for the rest of the game.

name: Armour Plates
description: The figure gains +2 Armour. This power can't be used if the figure is already wearing combat armor.

name: Armoury
description: The crew can field one suit of combat armor without having to pay it's normal upkeep cost.  Or you can give your weapon a +1 damage for the next game.

name: Bait and Switch
description: Target figure with loot token must make a Will Roll (TN14). If failed, the figure drops the token and the activator may move it up to 4 inches in any direction.

name: Break Lock
description: Unlocks one physical loot counter.

name: Bribe
description: If successful, place one bribe token next to the table and make your opponent aware of it. At any point in the game, when your opponent declares that a soldier is making a Shoot attack before dice are rolled, you may play your bribe token, causing the attack to miss (only once per game).

name: Camouflage
description: No figure may draw line of sight to this figure if it is more than 12 inches away. Also it gains +2 Fight agains Shooting attacks

name: Cancel Power
description: Cancels effects of one ongoing LOS power

name: Command
description: Select one crew member. That figure now activates in current player's phase of turn.

name: Concealed Firearm
description: Only while in combat, target may make +5 Shooting attack. If it hits shoot target is pushed 1 inch and stunned.

name: Control Animal
description: Target animal must make Will Roll (TN16) or become temporary member of crew.

name: Control Robot
description: Target robot must make Will Roll (TN15) or become temporary member of crew.

name: Coordinated Fire
description: Target crew member gets +1 Shoot for rest of game.

name: Create Robot
description: Add one robot soldier to crew without cost.

name: Dark Energy
description: Make +5 Shoot attack against enemy within 12 inches. Ignores Armour. +7 Shoot vs robots.

name: Data Jump
description: Targets crew carrying data-loot token. Can move token to another crew member.

name: Data Knock
description: Unlocks one data-loot counter.

name: Data Skip
description: If data-loot token not carried, caster can move it 4 inches in any direction. If being carried, carrier must Will Roll (TN16) or it is moved from them.

name: Destroy Weapon
description: Destroys one weapon carried by enemy target.

name: Drone
description: Place drone next to caster. Counts as crew member for rest of game. Can deliver caster Touch powers.

name: Electromagnetic Pulse
description: If targets a robot, robot must make Will Roll (TN18). If fails it takes no actions next activation. If non-robot, weapon jams and has -1 damage for rest of game.

name: Energy Shield
description: Creates shield around caster that absorbs next 3 points of damage.

name: Fling
description: May move crew member 6 inches immediately but it is stunned after move. Or enemy target must make Fight Roll (TN16) or be moved 6 inches and is stunned.

name: Fortune
description: Place a fortune token next to caster. Can use token to reroll a Combat, Shooting or Stat roll.

name: Haggle
description: When selling, crew receives 20% more than usual price.

name: Heal
description: Heals up to 5 points of health on target within 6 inches.

name: Holographic Wall
description: Creates wall 6 inches x 3 inches. Line of sight cannot be drawn through it but can move through it.

name: Life Leach
description: Target must make a Will Roll (TN15) or lose 3 health and caster gains 3 health.

name: Lift
description: Move target crew member 6 inches, even vertically.

name: Mystic Trance
description: If activated, figure may attempt one other non-targeting power before initiative.

name: Power Spike
description: Next Shooting attack does +3 damage.

name: Psionic Fire
description: Caster places 2 flamethower templates. Figures in path suffer +3 flamethrower attack.

name: Pull
description: Target figure must make Will Roll (TN16) or be moved 6 inches in any direction.

name: Puppet Master
description: Non-robot crew at 0 health returns to table with 1 health and is wounded.

name: Psychic Shield
description: Target takes half damage from next shooting attack against it.

name: Regenerate
description: Caster regains up to 3 health.

name: Remote Guidance
description: Targets robot crew member. Target activates at same time as caster.

name: Remote Firing
description: Targets robot crew member. Target makes immediate +3 Shooting attack.

name: Repair Robot
description: Targets robot crew member. Target regains up to +5 health.

name: Restructure Body
description: Caster gains one of following: Amphibious, Burrowing, Expert Climber, Immune to Criticals, Immune to Toxins, or Never Wounded.

name: Quick-Step
description: Caster may immediately move 4 inches, even out of engagement.

name: Re-wire Robot
description: May enhance robot crew +1 to Move, Shoot, Fight or Armour but suffers -1 Will.

name: Suggestion
description: Target must make Will Roll (TN16) or drop any loot it is carrying and be moved by caster 3 inches.

name: Target Designation
description: Target figure takes -2 Fight when rolling against a Shoot attack for rest of battle.

name: Target Lock
description: Caster makes immediate grenade attack in range, doesn't need line of sight.

name: Temporary Upgrade
description: Caster adds +1 to Move, Fight, Shoot or Armour, or +3 Will.

name: Toxic Claws
description: Caster grows claws that are Toxic and do +2 damage.

name: Toxic Secretion
description: Caster selects up to 2 crew (can include self). All attacks from those count as Toxic.

name: Transport
description: Targets crew within 12 inches. Target can be moved 6 inches in any direction.

name: Void Blade
description: Caster's hand weapon gains +2 damage, gains +3 Fight against Shooting attacks.

name: Wall of Force
description: Creates indestructable wall 6 inches x 3 inches.
